channel.title: Epstein Files Daily
channel.description: Daily news roundups covering the Jeffrey Epstein DOJ file releases. Aggregated coverage from multiple sources.

item.title: February 9: Silicon Valley's Epstein Problem Gets Worse
item.description: Today's DOJ document release reveals extensive Silicon Valley connections. Peter Thiel appears in thousands of pages with lunch meetings spanning 2014-2017. Documents show Google co-founder Sergey Brin received outreach from Ghislaine Maxwell after meeting at TED in 2003.
